pages.text: This mob looks simple,$(br2) but it's too complicated and hard to understand.$(br2) Their culture is basically non-competitive, and most of their trade is related to soybeans.$(br2)After continuing to communicate with them for a while, it turns out that their ancestors can make advanced golems from tofu.$(br2)However, there is a technology that can develop so far without conflict...$(br2) Sigh, I wish the inhabitants of that overworld would emulate them.$(br2)
